data: Slogging through Venus' reeking muck and groping horrors toward the forbidding dome of Solar Science City—treasure-vault of the best brains in the System—Guardsman Venard remembered the frightened whispers: “An evil god rules there!”

Slogging through Venus' reeking muck and groping horrors toward the forbidding dome of Solar Science City--treasure-vault of the best brains in the System--Guardsman Venard remembered the frightened whispers: "An evil god rules there!"
